comments.body: The `StartupTest` will publish start-up metrics to [the dashboard](https://flutter-dashboard.appspot.com/benchmarks.html). I'm not sure these metrics will be useful? Can we add a `reportMetrics` to `StartupTest`'s constructor, default it to `true` and set it to `false` for this test?
No, I don't see the use of them either in this case. :-) Added the flag.
I wonder if the dashboard UI is ready to onboard so many new metrics? :smile:
Hehe. I actually cleaned up the dashboard on Friday and removed all deprecated (dart1) benchmarks.
